timeline.title: Team Founded
timeline.description: Ontario Tech Racing was established by a group of passionate engineering students with a vision to compete in Formula SAE.

timeline.title: First Electric Car
timeline.description: Completed our first electric race car and competed in FSAE Electric for the first time.

timeline.title: Virtual Competition
timeline.description: Adapted to virtual competition format during COVID-19, focusing on design and business presentation.

timeline.title: Return to Track
timeline.description: Returned to physical competition with improved car design and enhanced team structure.

timeline.title: Breakthrough Year
timeline.description: Achieved our best performance yet with top 10 finish and multiple design awards.

timeline.title: Innovation Focus
timeline.description: Introduced advanced battery management system and aerodynamic improvements.

timeline.title: Current Season
timeline.description: Building our most advanced electric race car yet with cutting-edge technology and expanded team.

projects.name: OTR F24
projects.description: Our latest electric race car featuring advanced battery management system and optimized chassis design. Placed 52nd at Formula SAE Electric competition.

competition.name: Formula SAE Electric
competition.location: Michigan Int'l Speedway in Brooklyn, Michigan

projects.name: OTR F2022
projects.description: Legacy vehicle 'Zippy' featuring improved design and performance. Placed 31st at Formula SAE Electric competition.

competition.name: Formula SAE Electric
competition.location: Michigan Int'l Speedway in Brooklyn, Michigan

achievements.title: Design Excellence Award
achievements.description: Recognized for outstanding vehicle design and innovation

achievements.title: Efficiency Award
achievements.description: Best energy efficiency in electric vehicle category

achievements.title: Top 10 Finish
achievements.description: Achieved top 10 overall finish at FSAE Electric competition

achievements.title: Best New Team
achievements.description: Recognized as the most improved team in the competition

achievements.title: Virtual Design Winner
achievements.description: Won virtual design competition during COVID-19
